name: Megaman In a Nutshell Fiter Meleeeee
name_original: Megaman In a Nutshell Fiter Meleeeee
description: This parody game was originally released on 8/22/2018. I made this horrible fighting game based on my Megaman In a Nutshell series using Game Maker Studio with   pretty much no experience with the software, as you can tell just by looking.  I created this using a game maker engine I have long since forgot the name of.  I am moving this game to itch.io since it's a safer and more suitable place to upload it, and since this is where I intend to release the mugman rpg when it comes out. Don't worry, I know how bad this is. Controls are included in a text file with the game.
